wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Michael Sunderland, CBE FRSA (born 24 August 1945) is a British businessman, who was President of the Confederation of British Industry from 2004 to 2006, where his priority was restoring confidence in business after a series of corporate scandals. He is the current Chancellor of Aston University.

response: Since May 2011, Sir John Sunderland has been the Chancellor of Aston University.
